name: WP Airdrop Manager
author: Kades Themes

sections.description:
WP Airdrop Manager is a plugin allows you add and manager Airdrop, Bounty Hunt and ICO projects. Best fit for Cryptocurrency Affiliate site or Magazine or blog about Crypto.

Theme Compatible With WP Airdrop Manager

Bitcoinee – free Cryptocurrency WordPress Theme by Kades Themes.

WP Airdrop Manager plugin will work with any theme, but it may require some styling to make it match. We always here to support you if any problems happen.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/airdrop directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Airdrops->Add new screen to create new Airdrop project

Detail document here: https://kadesthemes.com/wordpress-plugins/airdrop/
sections.changelog:
1.0.5

  • resolved error can’t access file on line 373

1.0.4

  • fix bug some users can’t update plugin

1.0.3

  • New: setting page for plugin basic config
  • New: shortcode to display list of airdrops anywhere: [airdrop num=4]
  • Update: latest version of Font Awesome (5.0.13)
  • Update: latest version of Bootstrap (4.1.1)
  • Improved: code optimized

1.0.2

  • Fixed: a bug cause error when load Airdrop single template

1.0.1

  • Added: Token Symbol field
  • New: support template override in theme
  • Improved: CSS & code optimized
  • Translate Ready

1.0

  • Initial public release
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/airdrop directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Airdrops->Add new screen to create new Airdrop project

Detail document here: https://kadesthemes.com/wordpress-plugins/airdrop/
